property.name: createToolVersionQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO pipeline.tool_version ( id, tool_id, version, digest, size, modified_date ) VALUES ( :ID, :TOOL_ID, :VERSION, :DIGEST, :SIZE, :MODIFIED_DATE )

property.name: updateToolVersionQuery
property.value: UPDATE pipeline.tool_version AS tv SET digest = :DIGEST, size = :SIZE, modified_date = :MODIFIED_DATE WHERE tv.tool_id = :TOOL_ID AND tv.version = :VERSION

property.name: deleteToolVersionQuery
property.value: DELETE FROM pipeline.tool_version tv WHERE tv.tool_id = ? AND tv.version = ?

property.name: deleteToolVersionsQuery
property.value: DELETE FROM pipeline.tool_version tv WHERE tv.tool_id = ?

property.name: loadToolVersionQuery
property.value: SELECT DISTINCT tv.id, tv.tool_id, tv.version, tv.digest, tv.size, tv.modified_date FROM pipeline.tool_version AS tv INNER JOIN pipeline.tool tl ON (tl.id = tv.tool_id) LEFT JOIN pipeline.tool t ON (t.link = tl.id) WHERE ? IN (t.id, tl.id) AND tv.version = ?

property.name: loadToolVersionSettingsQuery
property.value: SELECT DISTINCT tv.id, tv.tool_id, tv.version, tv.settings, tv.size FROM pipeline.tool_version AS tv INNER JOIN pipeline.tool tl ON (tl.id = tv.tool_id) LEFT JOIN pipeline.tool t ON (t.link = tl.id) WHERE ? IN (t.id, tl.id) AND tv.version = ?

property.name: loadToolSettingsQuery
property.value: SELECT DISTINCT tv.id, tv.tool_id, tv.version, tv.settings, tv.size FROM pipeline.tool_version AS tv INNER JOIN pipeline.tool tl ON (tl.id = tv.tool_id) LEFT JOIN pipeline.tool t ON (t.link = tl.id) WHERE ? IN (t.id, tl.id)

property.name: createToolVersionWithSettingsQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO pipeline.tool_version ( id, tool_id, version, settings ) VALUES ( :ID, :TOOL_ID, :VERSION, to_jsonb(:SETTINGS::jsonb) )

property.name: updateToolVersionWithSettingsQuery
property.value: UPDATE pipeline.tool_version AS tv SET settings = to_jsonb(:SETTINGS::jsonb) WHERE tv.tool_id = :TOOL_ID AND tv.version = :VERSION
